name: Swarm of the Sea (Swarm of the Sea)
name_original: Swarm of the Sea (Swarm of the Sea)
description:
Originally conceived as a submission for ZenoJam 2022.

You are but a humble lightkeeper. Keep the light on to guide ships to safety and brace the night, but beware! The same guiding light also attracts the most evil creatures. Are you seaworthy enough to bear the beacon?

Team

Art  -  Kirill Blumenkrants, Grigory Matovnikov, Olga Serdyukova

Programming  -  Joran De Braekeleer

Music - Love Sorrow by Aljosha "AK" Konstanty, Blank Light by Adi Goldstein
